News

In March, there will be numerical diplomas in the life of the fountains and OSAG on 1 day

In March, several new laws will come into force, the country will have one-day OSAG policies and digital education documents. In addition, hospitals would be better protected against fires, and some retirees would benefit.

The cameras found that the Penzen drivers like speed

In the Penza region, more than 108,000 road traffic violations have been recorded since the beginning of 2024.
28.02.2024

Pedestrian and Porsche driver ' s arguments have been commented on in the region ' s UMCD


In the press service of the Regional Office of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, comments were made on the driver and pedestrian conflict that took place in Penza on 25 February.
28.02.2024

In Penza, students rescued a woman from phone frauds.


In the Oktyabrsk district, Tigris police officers, students from the Ekaterin Rudenko College and Ilya Vedyushkin, saved a pen from losing 105,000 roubles.
28.02.2024

The State has passed a law on the total prohibition of advertising by foreign agents.


The State has passed a law on the total prohibition of advertising by foreign agents. This is reported in plenary, and the broadcast is available on the Lower House of Parliament website.
28.02.2024

The Russians were advised to give up tea in bags.


The use of tea in packages may be hazardous to health, warning the docent of the physiology department, human ecology and medical and biological knowledge State University of Education, physiologist Alexander Sozykin. He talked about the danger of this drink with News.ru.
28.02.2024

Russia threw a stick into a neighbor's air conditioner because of the noise that was disturbing.


Ingushetia's resident was wearing a wooden stick in a neighbor's air conditioner because of the noise that caused her. Telegram-canal Mash Gor reported it.
28.02.2024

Last house of ZK Novella: why should I draw attention to it?


The sale of the last house of the Zakhoella project is open. Technicians of Termod Holding told us why we should focus on the apartments here.
28.02.2024

There were 57 fake bills in the Pennsentiary region for a year.


In the fourth quarter of 2023, there were 15 fake bills in the Pennsentiary Region. On Wednesday, 28 February, the Regional Office of the Bank of Russia reported this.
28.02.2024

The people of Penza are going to return the taganates.


The Penns will return a well-known art-object-- Taganaite. They were located in the Slava Square from 2006 to 2020.
28.02.2024

When should the child support the parent?


My father doesn't work for health, and he needs to be taken care of. But he didn't help me with my brother when he was a kid, but he left with his mother and didn't divorce. Should we support him now?
28.02.2024

The dorman deceived the label by 900,000 when the goods were delivered


In a short period of time between January and April 2023, an intrudent had damaged the Internet store by over 900,000 roubles.
28.02.2024

Oncologist warned of one big belly risk.


A significant increase in the size of the belly may be related to the development of mesothelioma, the primary malicious abdomen, warned the oncologist, the onco-surgeon, the chemotherapist of Anton Ivanov. The dangerous reason for the emergence of a large belly was he calling in a conversation with Gazette.ru.
28.02.2024

In Penza, a man reported that he had mined a nurse.


In Penze, students and teachers were evacuated from the medical school building on Lermontov Street, 5.
28.02.2024

The Russians have been piling on a brotherly grave and jumping through the Eternal Fire.


In Kaliningrad, a man and a woman desecrated monuments to the soldiers of the Great Patriotic War. Their fraternal grave is reported by MK.
28.02.2024

It has become known that the recruitment of SBOs in colonies continues.


The Ministry of Defence of Russia continues to recruit special military operations (SBOs) in colonies. The convict for the sale of drugs was told by a resident of Chelabinsk who entered into a contract with the agency, writing Msk1.ru.
28.02.2024

The doctor came to call an armed Russian and threw a gun at his hands.


A female doctor came to call an armed patient in St Petersburg and kicked his gun. On Wednesday, 28 February, Fontank reports.
28.02.2024

The son of the pencil architect Lion Hodos found dead.


The body of the 36-year-old son of a famous Penzonic architect, Lion Hodos, was found in an apartment on the Open Highway in Moscow. Regnum reports it.
28.02.2024

Penns from the street. Kalinina promises to get the heat back by night.


Repairs on the Kalinin Street in Penza, where a communal accident occurred the previous day, and the roads were coughed, were completed in 13:43 Wednesdays, 28 February. A representative of the resource organization reported this.
28.02.2024

Penzen schoolchildren complained about the Tarakans.


On Wednesday, 28 February, penzens shared videos allegedly made at school No. 76. The author sealed a cockroach running along the wall in the toilet.
28.02.2024

The pencils dropped the cable on a million roubles.


For eight months, 32-year-old and 44-year-old foams sniffed out of the cable and fell when the damage exceeded a million roubles. They were able to kidnap more than 1,200 metres.
28.02.2024

The Moksha Hospital started changing windows.


In the Moksha district hospital, the camp is responsible for the replacement of windows and the separation of walls. They are performed in the gynaecological unit and the surgical unit.
28.02.2024

Fluorography is free of charge at the Penza on Saturdays.


A World Tuberculosis Day event will be held in Penza on 24 March.
28.02.2024

For the first time, the Penns will present the Bengal Tigers


Vivat will first launch a major project in the Penza, the Bengal Tigers. A large family holiday will welcome children and adults ' programmes for different ages throughout the entire year in the parking area of the Wallag (Straits, 1v).
28.02.2024

Installation of a new road sign on the District translated for almost a year


The Road Sign " Wildlife " , which in July promised to be installed on the street of the District until the end of the fall, was never there. Don't wait for him in the coming months. Reason - IBU ' s load of PENzavodor.
28.02.2024

Construction of a school in Zara will take place 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.


The construction of a school for 1,100 places is continuing in Zara. On Tuesday, 27 February, officials evaluated progress.
28.02.2024

In Penza, the suburban illegally produced millions of cigarettes


A 46-year-old suburb in Penza started the production of cigarettes and became a criminal case. His products had no excise stamps and employees had permission to stay in the country.
28.02.2024

In Penza, taxi driver demanded 1.5 million for passenger death


A 43-year-old foreign taxi will be tried in Penza, whose 47-year-old passenger died in an accident. The accident happened last night on 12 November.
28.02.2024

The negator threatened to shoot Ahoun's resident in her courtyard.


A resident of Sniper Passage (Ahuna) threatened to shoot a stranger in her own house. They found the man, and now they're gonna judge.
28.02.2024

A driver who hit a woman on Spartacus is wanted in Penza.


The State Inspectorate asks the penzens to help find the driver who suffered 69-year-old women. The car hit a retiree in Ahounah and went off.
28.02.2024

All the nerves have gone: Penzens are asked to report vehicle evacuations


Not all motorists violate traffic rules deliberately. Later, when they return to the location and find the vehicle, they are under severe stress without knowing what happened and where to find the car.
28.02.2024

Prison urologists received a new apparatus for two weeks.


In Penze, a laser fragmentation device for rocks in urinating pathways was installed in the G. A. Clinical Hospital No. 6. He was brought in for two weeks, and he was reported to the medical clinic.
28.02.2024

Prices of rented housing and health services are increasing in the Penza region


In January, the annual inflation rate in the Penza region slowed down from December to 6.5 per cent (6.8 per cent).
28.02.2024

There was another communal accident on the heat networks in Penza.


Following the break-up of the heat networks on the Kalinin Street that took place on Tuesday, 27 February, there was another communal accident at Penza this time at the Red and Sverdlov streets.
28.02.2024

In Kolyshla district, the ceramic spoon became the weapon of crime.


A family couple living in the Kolyshley district has engaged law enforcement agencies in clarifying relations.
